title: Open Ambient Soundscapes
description: A collection of ambient music with an open and spacious mood, perfect as background music in a wide variety of games.
longDescription:
A collection of ambient music with an open and spacious mood, perfect as background music in a wide variety of games, increasing a sense of immersion and concentration of the player. Each piece of music has a version that loops seamlessly as well as a version with an ending.


Preview the music here!


Over 60 minutes of music:

1. Ambient Deep Breathing Loop 3:14

2. Ambient Deep Breathing 3:20

4. Ambient Mallets 2:31

6. Background Calm Groove 2:15

7. Beautiful Softness Loop 1:26

8. Beautiful Softness 1:30

9. Cinematic Chillout Ambient Loop 2:05

10. Cinematic Chillout Ambient 2:09

11. Emotional Warmth Loop 2:32

12. Emotional Warmth 1:04

13. Inner Breathing Loop 2:09

14. Inner Breathing 2:14

16. Moody Ambient Wash 2:50

18. Ocean Waves 2:53

19. Sleepy Beauty Loop 1:19

20. Sleepy Beauty 1:30

21. Soft Chillout Loop 2:13

22. Soft Chillout 2:16

24. Warm Stillness Loop 4:13

25. Warm Stillness 4:18

26. Warm Synth and Strings Loop 3:45

27. Warm Synth and Strings 4:00
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Seamlessly looping versions as well as versions with endings
  • All original music
  • Fast and responsive support

Number of Audio Wavs: 27

Number of Audio Cues: 27

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes/No

Minutes of Audio Provided: 60

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/sound-phenomenon/open-ambient-soundscapes-sampler
